text: Tunnel Boss
Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.
Best of Da Best
Grimgor fears no injury, but despite his war-ravaged appearance has an unmatched knack for avoiding it.
Back Wiv' Da Boyz!
Before the Black Orc Rebellion, Grimgor was no stranger to 'ard labour. He can teach the boyz a 'fing or two.
Bigger 'n' 'Arder
Grimgor is bigger 'n' 'arder 'n' betta than orl yoo uvver gits!!!
Da Alpha Orc
Turns out splitting rocks ain't too different to splitting heads!
Chain Gang
“All right, boyz. Let's show 'da bull-god 'oo's 'da best!”
Duck 'n' Weave
“Keep yer 'ead down an' don't stop running, gits!”
'Ard 'n' Fast
“Da lash makes ya tuff. But when 'da stunties don't let up, well... dey don't move too fast on 'dem legs.”
Waaagh!
“If yer die wiv' a clean choppa I'll throw yer corpse 'n Da Dropz!”
Grimgor's Clankers
The cacophonous tumult of a horde of shackled Greenskins is often the first sign of an imminent Chaos Dwarf attack.
Ironbound
Mentally subjugated by Astragoth's dark magics, Grimgor lives only to serve his brutal master's will.
